title: Message
description: Represents a single message within a ContextThread.

id.description: Unique identifier for the message (UUID v4).

threadId.description: Identifier of the ContextThread this message belongs to (UUID v4).

role.description: The role of the entity creating the message.

content.description: The text content of the message.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the message was created (Unix epoch ms).

metadata.description: Optional metadata associated with the message (e.g., tool call info, citations).

status.description: Optional status indicator for the message (e.g., 'pending', 'complete', 'error').
